design.custom_css: @font-face { font-family: 'ag_bold'; src: url('https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/acherus_grotesque_bold.otf'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'ag_extrabold'; src: url('https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/acherus_grotesque_extrabold.otf'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'ag_medium'; src: url('https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/acherus_grotesque_medium.otf'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } @font-face { font-family: 'ag_regular'; src: url('https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/themes/ion-ap3-child/fonts/acherus_grotesque_regular.otf'); font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; } * { border: none!important; } /*Header Styles*/ .toolbar-background { background: transparent; } .header-md::after, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="top"] > .tabbar::after, .footer-md::before, .tabs-md[tabsPlacement="bottom"] > .tabbar::before { content: none; } .toolbar-content { opacity: 0; } ion-navbar, .toolbar-background, ion-header { height: 11vh; min-height: inherit!important; } ion-content.content { height: 113vh; } button.search-button-header { display:none; } .bar-button-menutoggle ion-icon, ion-icon.back-button-icon { display: inline-block; padding: 0 2vw; } ion-navbar.toolbar { padding: 0 7vw!important; } .back-button.show-back-button { padding: 0!important; order: 7; } .back-button .back-button-text { display: none!important; } ion-buttons { margin: 0; } ion-header { background:#1d2633; position: relative; width:100%; left:0; top:0; } ion-header:before { height: 10vh; content: ''!important; background-image: url(https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/logo.png); background-size: contain; bottom: 0vh; background-repeat: no-repeat; width: 120vw; display: inline-block; background-position: center; vertical-align: middle; left: -10vw; position: absolute; z-index: -1; } .show-menu ion-header:before { width: 70vw; left: 14vw; } button.bar-button-menutoggle, button.back-button { height: auto; margin: 0; padding: 0; top: 0; min-width: inherit; } .back-button.show-back-button { padding: 0 0.2rem; } .bar-button ion-icon { font-size: 8vw; top: 1vh; position: relative; } ion-slides { height: 86vh!important; } ion-slides h3.slide-title { display: none; } .post-list ion-slides ion-slide { background-position: center; } .post-list ion-infinite-scroll { display: none; } .post-list .list { margin-bottom: 0; } .swiper-container-horizontal > .swiper-pagination { bottom: 1vh; } .swiper-pagination-bullet-active { background: #972a22; } .selection { padding: 0; } .selection h3 { font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; color: #972a21; font-size: 5.5vw; text-align: center; } .selection p { text-align: center; margin: 3vh 0; line-height: 1.5; padding: 0 8vw; font-size: 4vw; color: #252525; font-family: 'ag_medium'; } .selection h2 { font-size: 5.5vw; margin-left: 5vw; margin-right: 5vw; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; line-height: 1.2; position: relative; z-index: 1; color: #405f87; font-family: 'ag_bold'; } .show-menu ion-list-header { display: none; } .show-menu .menu-inner { background: transparent!important; width: 100vw; } .show-menu ion-list.list { margin: 0; padding: 2vh 0 2vh; background:#fff; } .show-menu ion-list.list:before { content: ""; text-transform: uppercase; color: #fff; font-size: 7vw; padding: 2vh 0; text-align: center; width: 100%; font-family: 'ag_bold'; display: block; } .show-menu button.item { padding-left: 0; background: transparent; } .show-menu ion-list.list>button.item { background-image: url(https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/menu_but_background.png); background-size: contain; margin: 0 0 15px; } .show-menu ion-list.list>button.item:nth-child(7) { background-image: url(https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/menu_but_background2.png); background-size: contain; margin: 0 0 15px; } .show-menu button.item .item-inner { padding: 0; flex-direction: column; } .show-menu button.item ion-label { text-transform: uppercase; color: #fff; font-weight: 400; font-family: 'ag_medium'; font-size: 6vw; margin: 2vh 0; } .show-menu ion-content { background: #141423!important; } .menu-inner .list-ios .item-ios .item-inner { background-image: none; } ion-buttons.bar-buttons[end] { order: 1; } .page-river-of-life-home div.cellular-instructions { color: #252525; position: absolute; display: block; font-size: 3vw; background: #eee; width: 100vw; left: 0; top: 40%; padding: 2vh 6vw 2.25vh; animation: cssAnimation 0s 8s forwards; visibility: hidden; z-index: 1; height: auto; } .page-river-of-life-home div.cellular-instructions li { font-size: 3vw; margin: .75vh 0; color: #252525; } .page-river-of-life-home div.cellular-instructions ol, .page-river-of-life-home div.cellular-instructions ul { padding-left: 5vw; } .page-river-of-life-home iframe.ap3-iframe { z-index: 10; position: relative; } @keyframes cssAnimation { to { visibility: visible; } } .page-river-of-life-push-archive, post-details ion-content { background: url(https://stjohntxapp.thechurchonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/subback.png) center/cover; } .page-river-of-life-push-archive ion-list, post-details .selection { margin: 0 3vw; background: #fff; padding: 13vh 0 2vh; min-height: 102vh; } .page-river-of-life-push-archive ion-list>ion-item-sliding:nth-child(even) button { background: #eee; } .page-river-of-life-push-archive ion-list>ion-item-sliding h2 { font-family: 'ag_bold'; font-size: 4vw; color: #252525; } .page-river-of-life-push-archive ion-list>ion-item-sliding p { font-family: 'ag_medium'; font-size: 3.75vw; color: #252525; } #social_wrapper{ margin:50px 0 60px; background:#c7c7c7; text-align:center; } #social_wrapper .social_icons{ display:inline-block; width: 14%; margin:15px 2px 5px; min-height:40px; } /* ----------- iPhone 5, 5S, 5C and 5SE ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 320px) and (device-height: 568px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { } /* ----------- iPhone 6, 6S, 7 and 8 ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 375px) and (device-height : 667px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { .bar-button ion-icon { } ion-header:before { } } /* ----------- iPhone 6+, 7+ and 8+ ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 414px) and (device-height : 736px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 3) { } /* ----------- iPhone X ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width : 375px) and (device-height : 812px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio : 3) { button.bar-button-menutoggle, button.back-button { top: -2.25vh; } } @media only screen and (device-width : 414px) and (device-height : 896px) and (-webkit-device-pixel-ratio : 2) { button.bar-button-menutoggle, button.back-button { top: -2.25vh; } } /* ----------- iPad 1, 2, Mini and Air ----------- */ @media only screen and (device-width: 768px) and (device-height: 1024px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 1) { } /* ----------- iPad Pro 12.9" ----------- */ /* Portrait and Landscape */ @media only screen and (device-width: 1024px) and (device-height: 1366px) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2) { }
